reviewText: But it's entirely in German!  What a waste of money.  I feel pretty stupid.  Oh well, I play it alongside orchestra music on public radio, so it works, but this is not what I had hoped for looking for a present for my ballet- obsessed toddler.  False advertising.  It seems like a great instructional program, but maybe it should include a Rosetta Stone disc on German, since it is advertised as a bilingual dvd.  Booooooo!
